elements.text: You've been noticing your hands shaking badly when you hold your phone. Lately, you've even been dropping the phone on the ground as you're talking. When your phone rings in public, you avoid answering because you worry about feeling...

elements.name: Holding the Phone_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
